mods.abstract: Garrett's Snuff sponsored Variety show, program numbers 322 and 323, featuring Happy Hal Burns (performer) and the Variety Gang (performers), Kid Clark (performer), the Love Brothers (performers), Lonnie Love (performer) and comedy skits performed by the cast. Broadcast on March 26, 1942 and March 27, 1942, respectively.

subject.topic: Garrett's Snuff and Dental Snuff Variety Program (Radio program)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
